means: （原始部落中）割取敌人首级作为战利品的人

entry.def: A headhunter is a person who tries to persuade someone to leave their job and take another job which has better pay and more status.

means.word_mean: 1. a recruiter of personnel (especially for corporations)
2. a savage who cuts off and preserves the heads of enemies as trophies
